Text:
only 4 albums?

no logs, no cues???

The Smiths only recorded four main albums.  The rest are compilations of older songs.  

As far as log/cue files I don't include them.

"Best of! Most of!
Satiate the need
Slip them into different sleeves!
Buy both, and feel deceived
"And when it fails to recoup?
Well, maybe:
You just haven't earned it yet, baby"

Yes, 4 main albums - you are correct Sir!

Log - verifies rip for us [EAC secure - all tracks accurately ripped]

Cue [noncompliant] - allows for CD disc image to be reconstituted
Mostly good, but How Soon Is Now? appears to be broken. It stops playing at around 5:45 and my player comes back at me with "Error processing frame."
Thanks, this is the essence of The Smiths.
